name: Hidden Zoo
description:
It's a top-down game where you need to rescue animals that are disappearing or considered close to extinction, and bring them to your zoo. Your main objective is to take care of the animals that are in your zoo, feeding them, and also bring more animals that are scattered in the forests being hunted.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

Mouse Right Click and Left Click: Interact

Backspace: Exit Interfaces

Developers:

Enrico Machado Chiumento

Itch.io: Emyst1c
